enhanced_by.reason: Clearing the results before adding new ones ensures a clean state for validation.
Merging results before adding new ones can help in combining validation outcomes from different sources.
Retrieving the validator result after adding it can help verify the correctness of the added result.
Checking if the results are empty after adding can verify the state of the results collection.
Enumerating property names after adding a result can help verify the presence of the added result.
